meanings.definition: Lacking intelligence or good judgment; stupid.
meanings.sent1: The dimwitted student struggled to grasp simple math concepts.
meanings.sent2: She made a dimwitted mistake by forgetting her keys inside the house.
meanings.sent3: The dimwitted cat tried to chase its own tail, not realizing it was attached to its body.
meanings.sent4: His dimwitted decision to drive without a license led to serious consequences.
meanings.sent5: The dimwitted character in the movie always provided comic relief with his silly antics.

meanings.definition: Slow to understand or perceive; dull-witted.
meanings.sent1: The dimwitted turtle took its time crossing the road, oblivious to the honking cars.
meanings.sent2: He was often teased for being dimwitted and not catching onto jokes quickly.
meanings.sent3: The dimwitted robot kept bumping into walls, unable to navigate the room effectively.
meanings.sent4: Her dimwitted response to the riddle left everyone in the room puzzled.
meanings.sent5: The dimwitted sloth moved at a snail's pace, barely making any progress.
